about_the_game:
Note that this game is just an arcade game.

This game is a simple 3D flight shooting game.
It's an arcade-style game.
Player controls the aircraft(XF-99) to destroy enemy aircraft.

Features of this game

There will be various fighters, transport planes, and helicopters.

A number of friendly and enemy fighter aircraft (More than 100 aircraft per level)
Enemies and allies fight together in the same place at the same time.
Seven campaign levels.
There are 5 levels as a story after the war.
1 Score Ranking level (The ranking is displayed on the STEAM readerboard.)
Multiple extra levels.

Campaign Mission

Level 1: Maxell attacks our country again!

Level 2: Destroy an enemy helicopter battalion!
Level 3: The enemy occupied an ally's island. Shoot down all enemy fighters.
Level 4: Destroy all ground vehicles on the island.
Level 5: Prepare for a major air battle.
Level 6: Shoot down all enemy "Ace" pilots.
Level 8: Take a helicopter and destroy all ground vehicles.

Mission after the war

Level 9:???

Level 10: The enemy is supposed to have signed a peace treaty, but they sent a lot of old fighters to our country 's capital!
Level 14: Assassinate senior enemy officials in a night storm.
Level 16: Impossible mission. 1 vs 95! Can you survive?
Level 17: The enemy's ambush. Your computer needs a graphics board to play this level.

Side story

Level 11: Fly in a fighter plane like the F -16 and engage the enemy's squadron.

Level 12: Test flight of mass produced XF series.
Level 13: Get on an attack plane like A-10 and destroy all enemy ground units.
Level 15: Intercept unidentified enemies.

Level 7: The score ranking of this game is different from previous series in that you can play it as many times as you want as long as you don't quit the game. Compete for the total number of times the enemy was shot down.

Emerging country

Willsword - Player Country

Maxell - Enemy
Ulcafe - Ally of Willsword

Story

Advances in radar technology have made stealth fighters commonplace.

The Willsword country has developed the latest fighter XF -98. It is a fighter with high attack power and incredible durability.
The MD armor of the fighter greatly reduced radar performance.
MD armor is an armor that weakens an enemy missile by irradiating it with high-power laser and EMP.
Willsword further evolved the XF -98 into the "XF -99 Artemis".
The fighter became the ultimate invincible fighter and was feared by Maxell's pilots as a "Air fortress".

Controls

C: Camera Change

ESC: Pause
Mouse: Ascending, descending, turning
Right mouse click: Change weapons
Left mouse click: Shoot weapons
W: Speed up
S: Speed down
A, D: Moving aircraft left and right
Changing the graphics quality on the startup screen may optimize mouse sensitivity.
You may be able to configure the joystick in the [Input] tab of the startup screen.

highlighted.name: Massive Air Combat Secret Level completed
Massive Air Combat the scramble completed

detailed_description:
Suggestion for settings


Aircraft Operations

Use the A and D keys on your keyboard as well as the mouse.
You can move the aircraft left and right.

Please pay attention to the music when you broadcast the video.Music will be distributed as a bonus content(mp3 files) to those who purchase this game and it's not for sale. If we determine that the video distributer is undermining the interests of other players, we will claim our music copyright against video distribution services such as youtube.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 1.3GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: You need a graphics board(GTX1050 or higher) to play level 17.
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We're very sorry, but Sonic-Alpha has stopped developing games for the Mac. DLC games are not available.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics board(GTX1060 or higher) to play level 17.(Recommended)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: We're very sorry, but Sonic-Alpha has stopped developing games for the Mac. DLC games are not available.

name: Massive Air Combat

subs.option_text: Massive Air Combat - Commercial License - $3.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: You need a graphics board(GTX1050 or higher) to play level 17 and FREE DLC game.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You will need approximately 6 GB of free disk space to install the base game and all DLCs.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octo-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics board(GTX1060 or higher) to play level 17 and FREE DLC game.(Recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You will need approximately 6 GB of free disk space to install the base game and all DLCs.
